verses.text_plain: O Israel, return unto the Lord thy God; for thou hast fallen by thine iniquity.
verses.verse_html: 1O Israel, return unto the Lord thy God; for thou hast fallen by thine iniquity.

verses.text_plain: Take with you words, and turn to the Lord: say unto him, Take away all iniquity, and receive us graciously: so will we render the calves of our lips.
verses.verse_html:
2Take with you words, and turn to the Lord: say unto him, Take away all iniquity, and receive us graciously: so will we render the calves of our lips. ▼
▼ receive…: or, give good

footnotes.body_html: ▼ receive…: or, give good

verses.text_plain: Asshur shall not save us; we will not ride upon horses: neither will we say any more to the work of our hands, Ye are our gods: for in thee the fatherless findeth mercy.
verses.verse_html: 3Asshur shall not save us; we will not ride upon horses: neither will we say any more to the work of our hands, Ye are our gods: for in thee the fatherless findeth mercy.

verses.text_plain: I will heal their backsliding, I will love them freely: for mine anger is turned away from him.
verses.verse_html: 4I will heal their backsliding, I will love them freely: for mine anger is turned away from him.

verses.text_plain: I will be as the dew unto Israel: he shall grow as the lily, and cast forth his roots as Lebanon.
verses.verse_html:
5I will be as the dew unto Israel: he shall grow as the lily, and cast forth his roots as Lebanon. ▼
▼ grow: or, blossom
 , ▼
▼ cast…: Heb. strike

tokens.text: I will be as the dew

verses.text_plain: His branches shall spread, and his beauty shall be as the olive tree, and his smell as Lebanon.
verses.verse_html:
6His branches shall spread, and his beauty shall be as the olive tree, and his smell as Lebanon. ▼
▼ spread: Heb. go

tokens.text: shall be as the olive tree

verses.text_plain: They that dwell under his shadow shall return; they shall revive as the corn, and grow as the vine: the scent thereof shall be as the wine of Lebanon.
verses.verse_html:
7They that dwell under his shadow shall return; they shall revive as the corn, and grow as the vine: the scent thereof shall be as the wine of Lebanon. ▼
▼ grow: or, blossom
 , ▼
▼ scent: or, memorial

verses.text_plain: Ephraim shall say, What have I to do any more with idols? I have heard him, and observed him: I am like a green fir tree. From me is thy fruit found.
verses.verse_html: 8Ephraim shall say, What have I to do any more with idols? I have heard him, and observed him: I am like a green fir tree. From me is thy fruit found.

tokens.text: What have I to do any more with idols

verses.text_plain: Who is wise, and he shall understand these things? prudent, and he shall know them? for the ways of the Lord are right, and the just shall walk in them: but the transgressors shall fall therein.
verses.verse_html: 9Who is wise, and he shall understand these things? prudent, and he shall know them? for the ways of the Lord are right, and the just shall walk in them: but the transgressors shall fall therein.
